"Emergency Quests (Matching Passwords)":
"If you have a Matching Password set, you can join a Quest alongside other players using the same Matching Password

To set a Matching Password, select \"Open Quest Info\", then \"Set Matching Settings & Start\""

"To change a Matching Password, select \"Open Quest Info\", then \"Change Settings\", then \"Matching Password Settings\".

You can return to normal matching by deleting your Matching Password."
